1. Identify GPIO monitoring PIN for connected GARD.
2. Acquire the GPIO line for the chosen pin.
3. Set up all the variables of the current GPIO event ctx.
5. Add GPIO line to monitoring bulk.

2. Wait for event to occur on mon_bulk.
